Reviews.Title: “Only as a last resort”
Reviews.Author: runawayvespa
Reviews.Content: low standards comes hotels prepared chance reading reviews staying la week booked night night left paid slightly nicer hotel road rundown renovation bathroom particular dirty mould bathroom tiles stained didnt touch facilities functional basic decent size internet fast bed reasonably comfortable didnt encounter bedbugs plus noisy woken constantly night guests arriving coughing fits greeted arrived curt staff nice didnt swim pool looked clean free parking convenient wouldnt stay unless hotel underwent major renovation
